petExpressions.speak: Wohoo! I am so happy today!
Yehh! what a fantastic day
Call your friends! Let's party!
I like it when you feed me :)
You know what day today? Happy Day!
I am really on cloud nine!
Go away! I don't want to talk to anyone
Who ate my food?
Stop taking my food! I will bite you!
Feed me! I am hungry
Who gave me posioned food?It made me sick.
Why are you disturbing me?
I am an architect of destruction
I am not feeling well
Nobody likes me!
I need icecream :(
I have no friends
Alexa! play a sad song.
I am having such a bad day
What do you call a dog magician? A labracadabrador.
What did one volcano say to the other? I lava you.
What do you call a bagel that can fly? Plain bagel.
I was going to tell a pizza joke, but it was too cheesy.
I’m on a seafood diet. Every time I see food, I eat it
It’s gonna be legend-... wait for it… and I hope you’re not lactose intolerant because the second half of that word is DAIRY!
I ate an alarm clock yesterday. It was very time-consuming.

petCompliments.compliment: Hey userName! Are you a due date? Because I always miss you.
I know userName will replace me soon with new pet
userName you're so lazy, you forgot to feed me
I am feeling sleepy, stop disturbing me userName
I will die soon, if userName will keep feeding me bad food.
Stop feeding me too much, I don't wanna be fat
userName stop playing music so high, I am sleeping
userName take me out for a walk
userName,I bet you will never find a cute pet like me
userName I see you eating allday but you always forget to feed me
userName you don't take care of me
